name: BloodSuckers
description:
Mosquitos are the blood-sucking enemies of mankind.

In this game, you play as bloody, the tiny and living blood droplet. Your goal is to completely avoid the mosquitos whilst also avoiding the ever-growing bacteria cells.

You can also shoot blood droplets at the mosquitos by left clicking.

Credits - TechnicGames: BloodSuckers

SketchyLogic: Music https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles
